Content.Text:
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, perfect! That's just the way I like
my hair. You are the master, Allen.
<PAGE>
It's so good that we have you here in
town.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm honored that you think so. Of
course, it's nothing when you
consider my skill level.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's almost the Anniversary of the day I
met Camellia, so I'm preparing a
surprise for her.
<PAGE>
I need to get my hair ready for the big
day.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. You're a real straight up guy,
Charles.
<PAGE>
Or perhaps it's just that you really
love Camellia.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I do! Camellia is my goddess.
My everything!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You had to keep on asking her out before
she finally agreed to, didn't you?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's right. I whispered sweet words of
love to her for day after day.
<PAGE>
It took a whole year before she finally
agreed to go out with me. I'll never
remember how happy I was that day!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow...
<PAGE>
What did you say to her, then, that
finally made such a goddess agree to be
with you? I'd love to know.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's my secret...
<PAGE>
Okay, okay. You did do my hair exactly
the way I like it. I'll put on a
complete reenactment for you.
<PAGE>
Sorry, Allen, could you be Camellia?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we go.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How beautiful you are! Your lustrous
hair, your alluring gaze, your delicate
skin.
<PAGE>
More than anything, I am captivated by
your rosebud lips...
<PAGE>
Please, use them now to whisper my name.
<PAGE>
And, if I may be so bold... to bestow
upon my the kiss of an angel.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see. A very passionate confession,
indeed. I'm sure the recipient would
remember it for the rest of their lives.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, my cute little Hina! Did you come to
get your daddy, little chicky?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Dad...

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, Hina? Did you miss your
daddy? I missed you!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Dad, what were you doing? You're 
confessing your love to Allen?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hina, I was just...

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Now you're making excuses? I saw it with
my own two eyes!
<PAGE>
You've got Mom! Why would you ever need
anyone else? Dad, you're horrible!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
And Allen? Really?
<PAGE>
I like Allen too! I'm not going to lose
him to you!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hina, wait. Please, listen to me.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Dad, I hate you!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Charles, are you okay?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
H-Hina, this is all just a mistake...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hang in there, Charles!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
That's one complicated family.
<PAGE>
Don't worry. I'll let Hina know what was
going on.
